snippet.textDisplay: easy way to get through the desert is to face the north Star and then turn right once and just keep walking.

snippet.textDisplay:
Yeah this part of the game I will always remember. I followed the stupid stars through the guide but never reached my goal and without the internets I got stuck forever...
Until now as I'm replaying the game. It make me kinda feel sad for the kid as he gets knocked down, caged, beaten up, stabbed with a sword, imprisoned, beaten up the third time, falling over a cliff, beaten up the 4th and got knocked out in the arena.
I hate Sunder and his bro. The most annoying bad guys in a game ever.
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay: Breath of Fire III was a game of good ideas and poor execution. The Desert of Death is a prime example of this.

snippet.textDisplay: These are really entertaining games.  I think they are a bit of an acquired taste, though.  There are usually some things about BoF games that I immediately don't like.  But once I play for awhile, it's easy to ignore the things I don't like about the games.  Breath of Fire III is a pretty good game.
snippet.textOriginal: These are really entertaining games.  I think they are a bit of an acquired taste, though.  There are usually some things about BoF games that I immediately don't like.  But once I play for awhile, it's easy to ignore the things I don't like about the games.  Breath of Fire III is a pretty good game.

snippet.textDisplay:

Now getting all of the secret items hidden in the desert of death, screw that.

snippet.textDisplay: Yes, yes, a million times yes. Breath of Fire III is possibly my favorite game of all time, with the Breath of Fire series sitting as possibly my favorite series in all video games. So thank you for spreading it's amazing soundtrack out there.

snippet.textDisplay: Yesterday's upload made me think of the Desert of Death. This theme is engraved in my head, I got stuck in there for at least a week trying to figure out where to go. Now I don't know if it's just because I was a kid when I played this game and I didn't pay attention or if this happened to a lot of other people, but that made for a memorable experience. Frustrating when playing after a week, but memorable in the long run.
snippet.textOriginal: Yesterday's upload made me think of the Desert of Death. This theme is engraved in my head, I got stuck in there for at least a week trying to figure out where to go. Now I don't know if it's just because I was a kid when I played this game and I didn't pay attention or if this happened to a lot of other people, but that made for a memorable experience. Frustrating when playing after a week, but memorable in the long run.
